abstract: NTT DoCoMo of Japan said it was in talks with some Asian mobile carriers for possible capital investment, Reuters reported.
snippet: NTT DoCoMo of Japan said it was in talks with some Asian mobile carriers for possible capital investment, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: NTT DoCoMo of Japan said it was in talks with some Asian mobile carriers for possible capital investment as it seeks growth overseas to offset its slowing cellphone market at home, Reuters reported.

headline.main: DoCoMo Said to Consider More Asia Investments
